+#![deny(unnecessary_import_braces)]
+#![allow(dead_code)]
+#![allow(unused_imports)]
+
+use test::{A}; //~ ERROR braces around A is unnecessary
+
+mod test {
+    pub struct A;
+}
+
+fn main() {}
